verses.text: Listen \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer, God. Don’t hide yourself from \w my|strong="H1732"\w* supplication.
Attend \w to|strong="H8605"\w* me, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* answer me. I am restless \w in|strong="H8467"\w* \w my|strong="H5956"\w* complaint, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* moan

because \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* voice \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* enemy, because \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* oppression \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* wicked. \w For|strong="H6030"\w* they bring suffering on \w me|strong="H6030"\w*. \w In|strong="H6030"\w* anger they hold \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grudge against \w me|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H7563"\w* severely pained \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* terrors \w of|strong="H6963"\w* death \w have|strong="H7563"\w* fallen \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Fearfulness \w and|strong="H3820"\w* trembling \w have|strong="H5307"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. Horror \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H5307"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
I said, “Oh that I had wings like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dove! Then I would fly away, \w and|strong="H3374"\w* be at rest.

Behold, \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* wander far \w off|strong="H5414"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* lodge \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness.” \qs Selah.\qs*
“\w I|strong="H2009"\w* would hurry \w to|strong="H4057"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shelter \w from|strong="H7368"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* stormy wind \w and|strong="H4057"\w* storm.”

Confuse \w them|strong="H7307"\w*, Lord, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* confound their language, for I \w have|strong="H2363"\w* seen violence \w and|strong="H7307"\w* strife \w in|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7307"\w* city.

Day \w and|strong="H5892"\w* night \w they|strong="H3588"\w* prowl around \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w its|strong="H3588"\w* walls. Malice \w and|strong="H5892"\w* abuse \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* within \w her|strong="H7200"\w*.

Destructive forces \w are|strong="H3915"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*. Threats \w and|strong="H3119"\w* lies don’t depart \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* streets.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* an enemy \w who|strong="H3808"\w* insulted \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* could \w have|strong="H3808"\w* endured \w it|strong="H3808"\w*. \w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* hated \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* raised \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* up against \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* would \w have|strong="H3808"\w* hidden myself \w from|strong="H4185"\w* \w him|strong="H7130"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* companion, \w and|strong="H1431"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* familiar friend.
We \w took|strong="H3045"\w* sweet fellowship together. We walked \w in|strong="H3045"\w* God’s house \w with|strong="H3045"\w* company.

\w Let|strong="H1980"\w* death \w come|strong="H1980"\w* suddenly \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w*. \w Let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H1980"\w* alive \w into|strong="H1980"\w* Sheol.\f + \fr 55:15 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead. \f* \w For|strong="H1004"\w* wickedness \w is|strong="H1004"\w* among \w them|strong="H3162"\w*, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H1980"\w* dwelling.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* call \w on|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Evening, morning, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* noon, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* out \w in|strong="H3068"\w* distress. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w He|strong="H1242"\w* has redeemed \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w peace|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* battle \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, although there are many who oppose \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

God, \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* enthroned forever, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* hear \w and|strong="H7965"\w* answer \w them|strong="H1961"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs* \w They|strong="H3588"\w* never change \w and|strong="H7965"\w* don’t fear God.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* raises \w his|strong="H8085"\w* hands \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* friends. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* has \w violated|strong="H6031"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* covenant.

\w His|strong="H7971"\w* mouth \w was|strong="H3027"\w* smooth \w as|strong="H3027"\w* butter, but \w his|strong="H7971"\w* heart \w was|strong="H3027"\w* war. \w His|strong="H7971"\w* words \w were|strong="H3027"\w* softer than oil, \w yet|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* drawn swords.

Cast \w your|strong="H1697"\w* burden \w on|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w he|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* sustain \w you|strong="H6310"\w*. \w He|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* never allow \w the|strong="H1697"\w* righteous \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* moved.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* destruction. Bloodthirsty \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deceitful \w men|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* live \w out|strong="H7993"\w* half \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H5769"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.
